name: Therm-a-Rest Ramble Down Blanket
categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
description:
Ramble and roam with the comfort of home. This wide Therm-a-Rest blanket combines soft fabric with the warmth and packability of down. It’s a great option for chilly nights in huts, tents, vans or hostels. Hydrophobic 650-fill down staves off morning dew, and the polyester fabric won't get clammy. Snuggle up with it around the picnic table or throw it over your sleeping bags for particularly cold nights.Shell fabric and liner are 50-denier polyester. Shell is DWR (durable water repellency) treated.Soft liner keeps you comfy and warm on cool nights.650 fill-power Nikwax® Hydrophobic Down maintains loft better, and retains less moisture than traditional down.Down is certified to the Responsible Down Standard for animal welfare.Queen-sized coverage keeps you warm with room to share.Fits sleepers up to 6ft. 6in.Stuff sack included.

        Sustainability












                      Certified Responsible Down
